biography:
Jan Englert was born on May 11, 1943 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. He is an actor and director, known for Kiler (1997), Television Theater (1953) and Epilog norymberski (1971). He has been married to Beata Scibakówna since 1998. They have one child. He was previously married to Barbara Soltysik.

Height 	5' 9¼" (1.76 m)
name: Jan Englert
